text: Marc Chagall (1887-1985) was a Belarusian-French artist. Chagall can also refer to: *Chagall (film), 1963 short documentary film *Chagall (restaurant), former restaurant in Leidschendam, Netherlands *2981 Chagall, main belt asteroid ==Other people with the surname== *Bella Rosenfeld Chagall (1895-1944), writer and wife of Marc Chagall *Rachel Chagall (born 1952), American actress *Nic Chagall (born 1972), German music producer ==See also== * *Chagal, a village in Iran
title: Chagall (disambiguation)
